articles.title: A Cure for Type 1 Diabetes? For One Man, It Seems to Have Worked. - The New York Times
articles.description: A new treatment using stem cells that produce insulin has surprised experts and given them hope for the 1.5 million Americans living with the disease.
articles.content:
After years when nothing worked, a small team of researchers, including Felicia Pagliuca, a postdoctoral researcher, was in the lab one night in 2014, doing one more experiment.
